name: Struere Axio (1.0 Alpha)
description:
Currently working on this project, it is my Degree Work.

Here is the twitter of the project if you want to keep up with the updates https://twitter.com/struereaxio

The game will be rather short 20-30ish min (in the current state is about 10 min), I will be adding more stuff in the game but there will not be much more locations or rooms.

THIS IS STILL AN ALPHA 

Addressed issues:

-there are some textures missing (will be fixed next week)

-there is a puzzle missing (will be added as soon as I develop it, this may take a while)

-Font has to be fixed(will be changed once I have some time)

-main character is missing(will be added by the end of April)

-finish screen (will be added by the end of April)

-credits(will be added when I got the docs I need)

-fix UI (will be changed at the beginning of May)

-there is no music or any sounds (will be added at the beginning of May)
